statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 27 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 27 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
